sentences.english: Shakespeare do thellos, hellos wife, blame, call names Shakespeare is more fiercer, crueler.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚如许做，老婆叱骂莎士比亚更厉害了。

sentences.english: To not follow the truly humane will bring immeasurable harm.
sentences.chinese: 要是不亲热有仁德的人，那将带给咱们如许大的坏处。

sentences.english: I"ve heard of some such rumors."
sentences.chinese: 本人听到过一些如许的讹传。

sentences.english: Only then, can the group soar high and overcome any difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 只有如许，一个组合才能降服重重坚苦，展翅高飞。

sentences.english: Any specks of dirt are washed out.
sentences.chinese: 通过如许每一小点脏工具就会被清洗掉。

sentences.english: I pretended to be asleep so mum wouldnt talk to me.
sentences.chinese: 我假装困觉如许我妈就不会絮聒了。

sentences.english: I know it's not necessary. I want to do it.
sentences.chinese: 我知道没必要如许，可是我愿付。

sentences.english: It came from the toad which the girl had cared for with such kindness.
sentences.chinese: 它来自小女孩蛤蟆赐顾帮衬如许地仁慈。

sentences.english: We don't like the rim. The rim should be ridged.
sentences.chinese: 我们不喜好如许的盘边，盘边必需是脊状的。

sentences.english: It will save you much time when you go through the customs.
sentences.chinese: 如许可以让您在过海关时省往良多时候。

sentences.english: To capture such greatness in a single photograph is not easy at all.
sentences.chinese: 要在一幅照片上捕捉到如许的绝景，实在远非易事。

sentences.english: I don't think a hayseed like you could appreciate such a thing.
sentences.chinese: 我不觉得一个像你如许的乡巴佬能观赏这种东西。

sentences.english: No one but a fool would do such a thing.
sentences.chinese: 除了傻瓜外异国人愿干如许的事。

sentences.english: Flowers bloom and wither; melodies of the flute permeate the woods.
sentences.chinese: 就这样，林外花谢如许，林里青笛自生。

sentences.english: How do you remain so cool in such hot weather?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎样在如许热的天气下连结凉快的？

definition: variant of 辜負|辜负[gu1 fu4]
